data.eml:eml: Nylanderiadeceptrix sp. n., a new species of obligately socially parasitic formicine ant (Hymenoptera, Formicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Messer, Steven J., Cover, Stefan P., LaPolla, John S. (2016): Nylanderiadeceptrix sp. n., a new species of obligately socially parasitic formicine ant (Hymenoptera, Formicidae). ZooKeys 552: 49-65, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.552.6475, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.552.6475
